title: FR-Room Rental Form
requires5MilLabel: FR-Please select the amount of insurance coverage required:
serverAi: FR-I acknowledge that any third-party bartenders carrying their own insurance must name the insured as an additional insured.
socialAlcoholLabel: FR-Will the event have alcohol or cannabis being served?
socialAlcoholLabel1: FR-Yes - Alcohol Served by Venue or Licenced Caterer
socialAlcoholLabel3: FR-Yes - Cannabis Served by Licensed Caterer
smartServeLabel: FR-I acknowledge that alcohol will be sold/served by a professional/trained bartender or that all volunteer bartenders have/will have appropriate training prior to this event.
sopLabel: FR-I acknowledge that I must submit my Liquor License to facility staff. I also acknowledge that if the Liquor License is not submitted to facility staff before the booking insurance will not be in effect and the booking may be cancelled.
cannabisCertificationLabel: FR-I acknowledge those serving cannabis to others have proper certification and have provided you with a copy.
alcoholReceipts: FR-I acknowledge that alcohol receipts will not exceed $10,000 per day.
nonOwnedLiabilityLabel: FR-Please select the amount of non-owned auto insurance coverage you wish to add:
nonOwnedValidLicenseLabel: FR-Does every driver of the vehicles have a valid drivers' license?
nonOwnedTransportLabel: FR-Are you responsible for providing transportation and/or chauffeuring services, or transporting attendees?
nonOwnedRentingLabel: FR-Do you have any short term rental vehicles (less than 30 days)?
nonOwnedPhysicalDamageLabel: FR-Do you require physical damage coverage for the short term rental vehicles?
nonOwnedPhysicalDamageAmountLabel: FR-What limit of physical damage coverage is required per vehicle?
